member.name: T:Syroot.NintenTools.Yaz0.Yaz0Compression
member.summary: Represents a collection of methods to decompress Yaz0-compressed data.
member.remarks: If data is decompressed into a , no buffering has to be done, which is why there are specific overloads for instances. Buffering is required because of the high amount of seeking to read self-referencing data chunks.

member.name: M:Syroot.NintenTools.Yaz0.Yaz0Compression.Decompress(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decompresses the Yaz0-compressed contents of the file with the given name and writes them into the file with the given output name. The decompression is done in memory before it is written back to the output stream.
member.param: The name of the file from which the Yaz0-compressed data will be read.
The name of the file to which the decompressed data will be written.
member.returns: The number of decompressed bytes written to the output file.

member.name: M:Syroot.NintenTools.Yaz0.Yaz0Compression.Decompress(System.String,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Decompresses the Yaz0-compressed contents of the file with the given name and writes them into the given output . The decompression is done in memory before it is written back to the output stream. The stream stays open after this method returned the number of decompressed bytes written.
member.param: The name of the file from which the Yaz0-compressed data will be read.
The output to which the decompressed data will be written.
member.returns: The number of decompressed bytes written to the output stream.

member.name: M:Syroot.NintenTools.Yaz0.Yaz0Compression.Decompress(System.String,System.IO.MemoryStream)
member.summary: Decompresses the Yaz0-compressed contents of the file with the given name and writes them into the given output . The stream stays open after this method returned the number of decompressed bytes written.
member.param: The name of the file from which the Yaz0-compressed data will be read.
The output to which the decompressed data will be written directly.
member.returns: The number of decompressed bytes written to the output stream.

member.name: M:Syroot.NintenTools.Yaz0.Yaz0Compression.Decompress(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Decompresses the Yaz0-compressed contents of the input and writes them into the file with the given output name. The decompression is done in memory before it is written back to the output stream. The stream stays open after this method returned the number of decompressed bytes written.
member.param: The input from which the Yaz0-compressed data will be read.
The name of the file to which the decompressed data will be written.
member.returns: The number of decompressed bytes written to the output file.

member.name: M:Syroot.NintenTools.Yaz0.Yaz0Compression.Decompress(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Decompresses the Yaz0-compressed contents of the input and writes them into the given output . The decompression is done in memory before it is written back to the output stream. Both streams stay open after this method returned the number of decompressed bytes written.
member.param: The input from which the Yaz0-compressed data will be read.
The output to which the decompressed data will be written.
member.returns: The number of decompressed bytes written to the output stream.

member.name: M:Syroot.NintenTools.Yaz0.Yaz0Compression.Decompress(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.MemoryStream)
member.summary: Decompresses the Yaz0-compressed contents of the input and writes them directly into the given output . Both streams stay open after this method returned the number of decompressed bytes written.
member.param: The input from which the Yaz0-compressed data will be read.
The output to which the decompressed data will be written directly.
member.returns: The number of decompressed bytes written to the output stream.

member.name: T:Syroot.NintenTools.Yaz0.Yaz0Exception
member.summary: Represents an exception caused by invalid Yaz0 data.

member.name: M:Syroot.NintenTools.Yaz0.Yaz0Exception.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Syroot.NintenTools.Yaz0.Yaz0Exception.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given message.
member.param: The message provided with the exception.

member.name: M:Syroot.NintenTools.Yaz0.Yaz0Exception.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given message and inner exception.
member.param: The message provided with the exception.

member.name: M:Syroot.NintenTools.Yaz0.Yaz0Exception.#ctor(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given message.
member.param: A composite format string representing the message.
An object array that contains zero or more objects to format.
